::: {.large-text}
**Exploring West Coast Groundfish Trawl Catch Share program data**

:::

***

FISHEyE is a suite of apps that are used to explore and access West Coast Groundfish Trawl Catch Share program data. The data were collected by the Northwest Fisheries Science Center ([NWFSC](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/region/west-coast/northwest-science)) Economics and Social Science Program and include data from the Economic Data Collection Program, the NWFSC Pacific Coast Groundfish Fishery Social Survey ([PCGFSS](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/west-coast/socioeconomics/west-coast-groundfish-trawl-fishery-social-study)). [PacFIN](https://pacfin.psmfc.org/home/) data are also incorporated into the data tools.
